summary: A young militia is all that stands between a coming dead horde and their rural town decimated by the fracking industry.
cast: Billy Zane|Dee Wallace|Mischa Barton|Felissa Rose|Gabrielle Stone|Michael Kean|Joe Raffa|Ashley Sumner|Kyle Patrick Brennan|Angel Anthony Marrero|Davy Raphaely|Alexander Mandell|Brian Gallagher|Brian Anthony Wilson|Dan McGlaughlin|Eli Dietrich|Susan Moses|Ryan Oakes|Tony Meineck|Vince Rauss|Jim Fryer|Ellis Walding|Natasha Piletich|Ollie Lange|Mark Behar|Shawn Gilson|Adam Ginsberg|Ryan Greenspan|Michelle Jones|Nicholas Paul Pontoski|Rose Rizzo|Rachel Sammarco|Carolyn Seibert|Shannon Terrel|Nick Troy|Christopher Weite
title: Zombie Killers: Elephant's Graveyard
